Class FlipFitGymDaoImpl

java.lang.Object
com.flipkart.dao.FlipFitGymDaoImpl
public class FlipFitGymDaoImpl extends Object
The `FlipFitGymDaoImpl` class provides the data access layer for gym-related operations. It handles all database interactions for gym data, including creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting gym records.

  • Method Details

    • createGym

      public int createGym(FlipFitGym gym, int ownerId) throws SQLException
      Creates a new gym record in the database.
      Parameters:
      gym - The `FlipFitGym` object containing the gym's details.
      ownerId - The unique ID of the gym's owner.
      Returns:
      The generated `gymId` of the newly created gym.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • deleteGym

      public int deleteGym(int gymId) throws SQLException
      Deletes a gym record from the database using its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      gymId - The unique ID of the gym to be deleted.
      Returns:
      The number of rows affected (should be 1 if successful).
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • updateGym

      public int updateGym(FlipFitGym gym) throws SQLException
      Updates an existing gym record in the database.
      Parameters:
      gym - The `FlipFitGym` object with the updated details.
      Returns:
      The number of rows affected (should be 1 if successful).
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • getGymById

      public FlipFitGym getGymById(int gymId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a `FlipFitGym` object from the database using its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      gymId - The unique ID of the gym to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The `FlipFitGym` object if a matching record is found; otherwise, `null`.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • getPendingGyms

      public List<FlipFitGym> getPendingGyms() throws SQLException
      Retrieves a list of all gyms with a pending status (`gymStatus = 0`).
      Returns:
      A list of `FlipFitGym` objects that are pending approval.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • getGymsByOwner

      public List<FlipFitGym> getGymsByOwner(int ownerId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a list of all gyms associated with a specific gym owner.
      Parameters:
      ownerId - The unique ID of the gym owner.
      Returns:
      A list of `FlipFitGym` objects owned by the specified owner.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
